overview: A Feast for the Eyes! The richest woman in the world, Emilia Brandt (Briana Banks) invites guests to her lush, secluded resort. Confused as to why or by whom he was invited, Dr. Richard Wells (Dale DaBone), arrives a bit dubious. Once Emilia makes her entrance via helicopter, the fiesta begins! There is sumptuous food, delicious drinks, salacious salsa dancing and a turbulent orgy to end all orgies! Can Emilia ever top this incendiary celebration?
title: The Fiesta
